channel.title: Copy of Digg top 24 hours

item.description: Sometimes you just have to be adventurous... and sometimes it pays off!

item.title: [+1387] Valve Parodies Apple's "1984" Commercial
item.description: Mac users will have to wait until tomorrow to download Half-Life 2, but in the meantime we can watch a teaser that parodies Apple's lovely old 1984 commercial. Cute, Valve. Real cute.

item.title: [+1240] Ohh..I'm not trying this flavour [PIC]
[+1045] The 15 Most Annoying Levels In Video Game History
item.description: Gamers love a good challenge. Unless it involves an underwater level. Or a mine cart. Or pretty much anything from Mega Man 9. Come to think of it, gamers are frustrated by a lot of things. Hereâ��s a tribute to the levels that made us collectively break our controllers.

item.title: [+1017] Shaggy NOOOOO (PIC)
[+976] Why you shouldn't trust Facebook's apology
item.description: Parents of young children can spot an insincere apology from miles away."Sorry," your tot mumbles, after you find the dog half-shaved and your Xbox full of jam.

item.title: [+902] Scared Leopard is Scared!
item.description: "A leopard was enjoying his kill high in a tree when a lion spotted it," writes photographer Brenda Rusnak. "With the outmost of confidence the lion sauntered over to the tree, sat for a few minutes and then leaped, in one graceful movement, up to where the leopard was. The leopard took flight, into the air, landing on the top of the tree. . . ."

item.title: [+897] 25 Horribly Sexist Vintage Ads (PICS)
item.description: Since the 50's, a lot has changed in way of women's rights and their duties in and out of the house. I highly doubt any company could get away with phrases like "The Chef [mixer] does everything but cook - that's what wives are for!" nowadays.

item.title: [+854] Give empires a chance.. (Pic)

item.description: The latest comic from Mr. Oatsmang.

item.title: [+721] U.S. National Debt Clock--Rolls Over to 13 Trillion
[+697] High Tech Sniper [COMIC]
item.description: Introducing the most advanced sniper rifle, designed by Pid'jin.

item.title: [+684] I didn't want to fight bad guys today
item.description: Amateur filmmaker and the man behind the "Jedi A-holes" video, brings us a short clip, packed with a lot of asskicking. Great production for a small budget.

item.title: [+612] Untouched is impossible: the story of Star Wars in film
item.description: Star Wars: A New Hope has been re-released, re-edited, and updated more times than we can count. So how does the film exist today? What are the chances of a pure, high-definition version of the film? We explore the history, and future, of George Lucas' classic film.

item.title: [+604] Why Facebook Users Are Considering Leaving [CHART]
item.description: Last week we asked you, our readers, to tell us why you’re planning on leaving Facebook (if you actually are, that is). Well, more than 5,000 votes later, and the results are in: 31% of respondents proclaimed their intention to stick with FB, and approximately the same number cited access to personal information as their number-one reason for vamoo

item.title: [+591] Kendra's First Paycheck For Sex Tape -- $680,000
item.description: The reality television star secured the secret payment from Vivid, in addition to receiving up to 50% of sales.

item.title: [+582] Bleeding Glacier Spews Million-Year-Old Microbes
